entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or rain beginning before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Freezing rain inland in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
